thread.title: 4th Stay in as many months!
thread.title_full: 4th Stay in as many months! - Review of Ham Yard Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: NYCPLC
title: 4th Stay in as many months!
text:
This is a great hotel right in the center of London. The modern rooms have a touch of traditional d√©cor which fits the location well but importantly everything works as this is a relatively new hotel. The staff are always helpful and have gone out of their way to make sure that I am happy. The food and service in the restaurant are quite good and the bar is always packed from Wednesday through Saturday. The general facilities and all of the public rooms are great which is rare. The only drawback is the hotel tends to be very busy in the evenings so use the library for guests if you need a quieter space.
Room Tip: Higher floors are a bit quieter but in general the hotel is very quiet and the windows really insula... See more room tips
